name: 3 Elements: School club
description:
History:

In a mythical school, there are the typical sports, literature, dance and art clubs. But here there is a club called 3 elements, where its members play paper or scissors with each other to have fun and chat a little about life.

Max 4 year high school student, Eli leader of the literature club,

J is only known by his nickname, Phember. A social sciences teacher, who after his day of work, goes to the club in the afternoons with his cup of coffee to play. Valentino soccer player from the school and Cris. A computer engineer and head of technical support for the school,

who is just looking to get out of the work routine a bit and play for a while with his club friends.

Game mode:

Play against CPU:

This game mode is programmed to play directly against the machine. A faster response; When the player selects an item, the machine randomly picks an item,

to respond to the player's action.

2 Players:

Play with a friend. Don't let your opponent look at the item you want to pick. This way it will be more fun to play with other people. The two players will have to choose an element, when they have already decided,

they will have to press the green button to see who was the winner.

Setting:

There is a small game configuration system, to adjust the number of victories and how far the game can end, with a limit of no more than 15 victories.

Resources and sounds:

These resources used in the game,

They are owned by the users who are mentioned in the credits section, giving thanks for their hard work, for providing ready-made resources, and optimizing the design process. Resources hosted on websites where they can be used for commercial / non-commercial purposes.
